Customer ecosystem to attract, animate & retain them\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Loyalty\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"​\\nBuilds Couponing and Loyalty program in ManoMano and improves professional purchasing experience​\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pro Support​\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nEnriching the product and creating links between products to improve recommendations and add to cart functions.​\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Growth\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"​\\nAuthentication, registration and conversion of B2C users into B2B​\\n\\n​\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cart & Funnel​\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nImplemented \\\"save bank card\\\" functionality, integrated a new payment method - Klarna.​\\nNow we are working on implementation of Oney banner (like advertisement of installments).​\\n\\n​\\n\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cross Sell​\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nAdd some new recommendation engines to the product playlists and add a new algorithmic bundle in the product page to improve cross selling​\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
